Package cvut.fel.mobilevoting.murinrad.communications

Classes for communication with the server

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ConnectionInterface An interface that connection managers must obey to be used in this application
 

Class Summary
BeaconListener A listener class that listens for UDP beacons from a server the beacons are received ad UDP port 50666 SAMPLE BEACON: TestServer 10666 "
Connection Class that manages the actual connection to the server and sends the requests
Interceptor Implementation of a HttpResponceInterceptor the class intercepts the responces, parses them and then notifies the appropriate components
XMLMaker An XML serializer Creates XML in string form for various usages
XMLParser An XML parser that parses the XMLs that can be recieved in the communications
XMLParserTest Tester Class
